# Pandas plotting with Plotly backend
- The default plotting library used by Pandas is Matplotlib.
- I've always found Matplotlib very clunky, unintuitive and verbose
- [Plotly](https://plotly.com/python/basic-charts/) is a modern plotting library in Python which provides a ton of useful features over matplotlib such as
    1. Simple and intuitive API
    2. Less code to achieve same results
    3. Fully interactive charts! (zoom in, hover to view data, etc)
    4. Default charts look visually attractive
- There is a way to change Pandas to use Plotly as the default plotting engine with just one line of code! `pd.options.plotting.backend = "plotly"`
- This notebook take a look at some differences between matplotlib default and plotly default pandas plotting
